navigator.currentSubView: Scope 'Changed Files'; set:Changed Files; ALL; class com.intellij.packageDependencies.ChangeListScope

subPane.subId: Scope 'Changed Files'; set:Changed Files; ALL; class com.intellij.packageDependencies.ChangeListScope

task.summary: changes: • update example by showing settings with proper category division • do not allow change of the preference type if the app is Web App • allow selection/toggle events on radio buttons, checkboxes or switches when clicked on the tile instead of the main widget. • update Material color picker with more choices • remove simple color selector dialog, seems not be used in mobile app
changes: • update switch widget, allow toggle event even when clicked on the tile containing the switch and not the switch itself

changes: • remove rx-dart dependency, use StreamController • add Generics in widgets like, Radiobuttons and other • Dropdown widget
remaining: • add Dropdown widget in example • test new changes

Complete Makeover for existing working of Settings Screen: • New Cache ChangeListener instead of the rxdart BehaviourSubject • New ValueChangeNotifier to rebuild settings widgets when cache changes • Used these changes to remake Simple tile, Switch, Checkbox and radio
Complete Makeover for existing working of Settings Screen Part 2: • Added DropDown and Slider Settings
Complete Makeover for existing working of Settings Screen Part 2: • Added Color Picker Settings
Complete Makeover for existing working of Settings Screen Part 2: • Added Updated example app keys
Complete Makeover for existing working of Settings Screen Part 3: • Add Modal settings (opens in a dialog) • Add Expandable settings (settings expands below the tile itself)
Complete Makeover: • Improve Example to show case most of common settings • Update Modal Setting layouts
Changes: • Improve Example to show case most recognizable settings

Changes: • Added additional function in Switch and CheckBox settings tile - Now both supports showing additional widgets provided as `childrenIfEnabled` These widgets will be shown only when the Main widget state is checked/enabled

Changes: • check/test the code for custom onChange callbacks on each setting.
TODO: • need to add TextField settings

MESSAGE.value: changes: • update example by showing settings with proper category division • do not allow change of the preference type if the app is Web App • allow selection/toggle events on radio buttons, checkboxes or switches when clicked on the tile instead of the main widget. • update Material color picker with more choices • remove simple color selector dialog, seems not be used in mobile app
changes: • update switch widget, allow toggle event even when clicked on the tile containing the switch and not the switch itself

changes: • remove rx-dart dependency, use StreamController • add Generics in widgets like, Radiobuttons and other • Dropdown widget
remaining: • add Dropdown widget in example • test new changes

Changes: • Added additional function in Switch and CheckBox settings tile - Now both supports showing additional widgets provided as `childrenIfEnabled` These widgets will be shown only when the Main widget state is checked/enabled
